## CredentialEntity type

Credential Cache Type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CredentialEntity = {
    homeAccountId: string;
    environment: string;
    credentialType: CredentialType;
    clientId: string;
    secret: string;
    familyId?: string;
    realm?: string;
    target?: string;

};
```
